scene_title: Enthusiasm in Care of Magical Creatures
summary: In contrast to Divination, Hermione shows keen interest and respect during Hagrid’s first Care of Magical Creatures lesson. She listens attentively and is one of the few students to show kindness and encouragement toward Hagrid, even as the class spirals into disaster with Malfoy’s injury. Her concern for Buckbeak is sincere, and she defends Hagrid when others mock him. She maintains her composure despite the tension, clearly valuing the integrity of both magical creatures and those who care for them.
logline: Hermione shows heartfelt support for Hagrid and Buckbeak, defending them with both compassion and principle.
speech_style: Supportive and firm; balanced tone when defending others
location: Hogwarts grounds (Care of Magical Creatures paddock)
